Sentencas: We report a particle-solution spraying process for fabrication of porous electrodes for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Nanocomposite electrodes fabricated by a particle-solution spraying process for low-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Gd-doped ceria (GDC) particles with composition of Gd0.1Ce0.9O2 were suspended in ethanol containing nitrates of Sm, Sr, and Co in a molar ratio of 1:1:2 to form Sm0.5Sr0.5CoO3
Titulo: Nanocomposite electrodes fabricated by a particle-solution spraying process for low-temperature SOFCs
Nanocomposite electrodes fabricated by a particle-solution spraying process for low-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: The SSC solution carrying GDC particles was pumped through an atomizer and the resulting mist was combusted, depositing a porous composite layer consisting of SSC and GDC on a GDC electrolyte supported by a Ni-GDC anode.
Titulo: Nanocomposite electrodes fabricated by a particle-solution spraying process for low-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Typically, the SSC-GDC composite cathodes consist of large GDC grains (1-2 mum) embedded in nanosized phases of SSC.
Titulo: Nanocomposite electrodes fabricated by a particle-solution spraying process for low-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: The highly open porous structure significantly facilitates gas transport while the extremely large surface area dramatically enhances electrode kinetics.
Titulo: Nanocomposite electrodes fabricated by a particle-solution spraying process for low-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: As a result, the polarization resistances to oxygen reduction of the GDC-SSC/GDC interface are extremely low, varying from 1.06 Omegacm(2) at 450 degreesC to 0.45 Omegacm(2) at 500 degreesC.
Titulo: Nanocomposite electrodes fabricated by a particle-solution spraying process for low-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: The activation energy for the electrode reaction was estimated to be about 0.65 eV (62.5 kJ/mol), as determined from impedance spectroscopy performed at different temperatures.
Titulo: Nanocomposite electrodes fabricated by a particle-solution spraying process for low-temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: For a single cell with a configuration of SSC-GDC/GDC/Ni-GDC, peak power densities of 223 and 385 MW/cm(2) were achieved at 500 and 600 degreesC, respectively.
Titulo: Nanocomposite electrodes fabricated by a particle-solution spraying process for low-temperature SOFCs
